headline: Atlantic Union Bank Closes Sale of Approximately $2 Billion of Commercial Real Estate Loans to Blackstone
summary: RICHMOND, Va. & NEW YORK, June 26, 2025--Atlantic Union Bankshares Corporation (NYSE: AUB) ("Atlantic Union"), the holding company for Atlantic Union Bank (the "Bank"), and Blackstone (NYSE: BX) jointly announced today the closing of the sale of approximately $2 billion of the Bank’s performing commercial real estate ("CRE") loans acquired from Sandy Spring Bank to vehicles affiliated with Blackstone Real Estate Debt Strategies ("BREDS"). headline: Blackstone Buys Another $2 Billion in Discounted Commercial Real-Estate Loans
summary: Blackstone  is snapping up another $2 billion in commercial real-estate loans, extending the firm’s spending spree on discounted debt in the troubled sector.  The loans are performing and backed by apartment buildings and neighborhood retail.  Blackstone has been one of the largest buyers of discounted commercial property debt, having snapped up $20 billion of it in the last 24 months, including the latest loan portfolio.

headline: Is KKR Stock Outperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: As KKR has delivered stronger returns than the broader Nasdaq Composite over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a bullish outlook on the stock’s prospects.
